#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll power(ll i)
{
    ll pro=1;
    for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
    pro*=2;
    return pro;
}
int main()
{ll n;
cin>>n;
int i=0;
while(power(i)<=n)
{i++;

}
ll ans=0;
for(ll j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
{    ll a=power(j);
    ans+=n/a;
    n%=a;
    if(n==0)
     break;
}
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}
